title: Trump talks DOGE, border during address to Congress | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: House Republicans are being instructed to stop holding in-person town halls after DOGE complaints. | These and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: Greenland Prime Minister says 'we are not for sale' after Trump speech
shortDescription: The Greenland prime minister affirmed that his country is not for sale, after Trump said the U.S. should acquire the territory in his speech.

title: Who is Al Green? Texas congressman kicked out of Trump's address
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green made comments against President Donald Trump during his joint congressional address on Tuesday night.

title: Fashion makes a statement at Trump's joint address to Congress
shortDescription: See the fashion choices of politicians and guests at Trump's joint address to Congress

title: ISIS-K member charged in Afghanistan bombing against US troops: Trump
shortDescription: Trump said a member of ISIS-K was charged in the Afghanistan bombing that killed 13 US troops in 2021. Mohammad Sharifullah is due in court Wednesday.

title: 'How did that work out?' Trump taunts Democrats about criminal charges
shortDescription: President Donald Trump taunted Democrats for refusing to support his priorities and asked after facing four criminal cases: 'How did that work out?'

title: Supreme Court puts a dent in Trump's plans to halt foreign aid
shortDescription: The Trump administration had argued that a federal district judge is interfering in the powers the Constitution gives the president.

title: 'We can't normalize this' Some Black lawmakers walk out of Trump address
shortDescription: Several Black lawmakers walked out of Trump's address, but some stayed. ''This is our House. We’re not leaving,’’ said Sen. Lisa Blunt Rochester.

title: Watch: 'This is not normal' sign ripped away by lawmaker before Trump speech
shortDescription: Rep. Melanie Stansbury, D-New Mexico, held a sign that read “this is not normal" that Republican Rep. Lance Gooden of Texas ripped away.

title: Lawmaker rips sign from congresswoman's hands
shortDescription: Rep. Lance Gooden ripped a sign reading "this is not normal" from Rep. Melanie Stansbury's hands as President Trump entered the chamber.

title: President Trump's address to Congress: Watch the full video
shortDescription: President Donald Trump addressed a joint session of Congress on Tuesday night. You can watch his entire address here.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's address to a divided nation
shortDescription: Takeaways from the president's speech to Congress. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: Trump lays out policy demands for Congress in lengthy speech
shortDescription: The demands may further complicate congressional efforts to pass Trump's agenda through thin margins.

title: Analyzing President Trump's address to Congress
shortDescription: USA TODAY Washington Bureau Chief Susan Page takes a closer look at President Trump's address to Congress.

title: Six made-for-tv moments from Donald Trump's address to Congress
shortDescription: From moments created by the president to capture attention to interruptions by his opponents, Trump's address to Congress included these key moments.

title: Trump breaks Clinton's record for longest speech to Congress
shortDescription: Clocking in at nearly 100 minutes, President Donald Trump broke former President Bill Clinton's record for longest Congressional speech.

title: Democrats respond to Trump's Congressional address
shortDescription: Sen. Elissa Slotkin delivered the Democratic response to President Donald Trump's speech to a joint session of Congress.

title: Democrats target Elon Musk, Trump's 'reckless way' in rebuttal
shortDescription: The Democratic rebuttal to President Trump’s joint address to Congress Tuesday focused on kitchen-table issues while taking aim at Elon Musk.

title: Mocking foes, praising Elon, tariffs: Takeaways from Trump’s speech
shortDescription: President Trump mocked foes and defended his "America First" direction for the country amid anxiety about the economy and the nation's direction.

title: After laying off thousands, Trump barely mentions federal workers
shortDescription: Firing federal employees has been a key to Trump's first month in office, but they barely came up in his speech to Congress.

title: Trump says Ukraine ready for peace deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says he is ready to sign a peace deal in a letter he sent to Trump.

title: Trump tells Congress US will acquire Greenland 'one way or the other'
shortDescription: The president's designs on Greenland, the Panama Canal and Canada have been an early theme of his presidency.

title: Who is Jocelyn Nungaray? Trump renames sanctuary after murdered child
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held an executive order renaming a wildlife sanctuary to honor the late Jocelyn Nungaray.

title: Democrats chant 'January 6' at Trump during Congressional speech
shortDescription: Congressional Democrats invoked the memory of the January 6 attack on the Capitol during Trump's address on Tuesday night.

title: Trump to Congress: Would you like some shock with that awe?
shortDescription: In an address to a joint session of Congress, President Trump bragged about disruption and promised more. Oh, and have you met Elon Musk?

title: Elon Musk praised effusively by President Trump in joint address
shortDescription: Elon Musk had a prominent seat at President Trump's joint address ‒ and was praised effusively ‒ as the president defended DOGE.

title: Democrats protest during Trump's address
shortDescription: Democrats wore pink, displayed signs and even interrupted to show their displeasure with President Trump's policies during his address to Congress.
